channel.title: Help me - not for programs!
channel.description:
As you may or may not know, Rs-resources has been working on a new bot called ARGA. it is revolutionary in design. An old version of it (it has been greatly improved and recoded) was stolen from the development server by RLN. He posted it on his forum, and we were successfully able to get it removed.
but:
(09:34:03 AM) aaron :^): its ok its not that i would release it [b](09:34:06 AM) aaron :^): i would just send it to anyone i know (09:34:10 AM) aaron :^): and tell them to give it out[/b] (09:37:15 AM) aaron :^): ok (09:37:17 AM) aaron :^): no comments? (09:37:19 AM) aaron :^): thats what i thought (09:37:21 AM) aaron :^): moron (09:44:19 AM) aaron :^): ? (09:47:04 AM) aaron :^): banned me (09:47:05 AM) aaron :^): lmfao (09:47:06 AM) aaron :^): ok (09:47:10 AM) aaron :^): its getting released
So I ask of you, if you notice code floating around dealing with ARGA, MacroSoft, arga.rar, argagui, HiJack, etc, please report it to the admins of the forum and let me know about it so I can keep track.

item.title: Help me - not for programs!
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“afi”]afi Quit trying to feel [b]special[b][/quote]cause you are special(like special fred who swooshed a brick against your head and now that bastard friend made you special)

Read full topic

item.title: Help me - not for programs!
item.dc:creator: @afi afi
item.description:
@afi wrote:

[quote=“DeadBird, post:13, topic:4412”][quote author=afi link=topic=5726.msg58255#msg58255 date=1152153624]

Bullshit, They get a fucking COMPUTER then they want to make fucking money with some damn bot, ? Shit I"m just happy I got a computer and then there trying to make some more money for no fuckng reason.

  1. Make something and spend time on it. Then you can talk. As you know many programs are sold. Nothing wrong with selling it even if we did. We didnt even want to sell it. W just didnt want leeches. We now have a new way to rid leeches and have a free bot so its perfect for us. So basically afi. SDFU. It is no offence people like you who make people not want to release bots and thus at one point ARGA was going to be a private creation because leeches would be something we didnt want to handle.

It was coming anyways. Im just glad it was an early revision.

Meh, it was a fairly old revision RLN released so, doesnt really matter. Fair play to him.

Funny. If you been on rsr, you would know we have decided to release it free.

Edit : Source has been released, well semi source, see hacking tips

Sorry I don’t waste all My life on an fucking computer trying to be an nerd Okay, Now go find your closet hands knife to taios go slit your wrist and cry please?

afi,
the bot is authed,but free…(in most cases)
Acting like this isn’t going to get much anywhere…your just acting like an angry 8 year old that can’t get “dem geepeez”.
If your that sad,to flame people who can code…just…leave.
Taios has always released aryan updates for free back in the days,and this is what you treat her like? Let me guess,you attempted to make the sbot owner(s) feel bad didn’t you?
I’ve already got a free auth for helping an admin on the rs-r community…you don’t have to pay,you just need to be a good member of the community.
[me=DeadBird]wanders around thinking why bots aren’t openly released for free and then thinks because they land in the hands of people like afi[/me]
Even if I wouldn’t get an auth out of it,and I saw some bot lying around cracked I would tell the creators. Why? I respect programmers and the work they put into things.
If they choose to charge for their work (sorry impsoft,I still don’t forgive what you did with aryan but we’re still friends or whatever :P) then let them be. Its their work.

For One I only Use aryan When RegeX Realsed it at Kaitneiks forums.THe second thing I only used Mopararyan Updater when It came out I never used any OTHER BOT NOR DID I USE SLAVE BOT. Tiaos Quit trying to feel Indulgent.
[/quote]
From the look at this,I bet you were one of the “update the fucking bot regex you asshole” people,weren’t you?
and what is with your words…like…a mix of starting with caps and not.

afi:

Tiaos Quit trying to feel Indulgent.

Don’t try to look smart.

[quote=dictionary.com]Indulgent

adj 1: showing or characterized by or given to indulgence; “indulgent grandparents” [ant: nonindulgent] 2: tolerant or lenient; “indulgent parents risk spoiling their children”; “procedures are lax and discipline is weak”; “too soft on the children” [syn: lax, lenient, soft] 3: being favorably inclined; “an indulgent attitude”[/quote]

BTW,I don’t think she wants her named spelt wrong,its not that hard to use the quick reply button and look up before you post :D[/quote]
Forget this I don’t feel like arguring anymore bye kay thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me - not for programs!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

pistolbob:

wasnt taios the one that downloaded mopars one click updater and just released those or was that someone else?

she was updating before my updater Im almost sure, but there wasnt just one that used my updater to release aryan, a whole lot of noobs did

Read full topic

item.description:

wasnt taios the one that downloaded mopars one click updater and just released those or was that someone else?

No,it wasn’t Taios,because she was updating way before the moparupdater.
